title: Online Classroom Management and Digital Tool Utilization Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics knowledge and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Mathematics curriculum for advanced learners comprising professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields.

learning_goals: By effectively integrating digital tools (e.g., collaborative whiteboards, real-time feedback systems) in LMS-based online classes, instructional efficiency can be improved by 30%.
Designing and utilizing a technical support system (mentoring system, FAQ database) for online class operations improves instructors' tool proficiency by 40%.
Apply five or more strategies to adapt face-to-face teaching methods (discussions, problem-solving) to digital environments (e.g., asynchronous discussion boards, virtual problem-solving rooms).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
